Class tripleplay.anim.Flicker

The superclass changed from playn.core.Pointer.Adapter to playn.scene.Pointer.Listener.
Removed interface tripleplay.util.Paintable.

Removed Methods
void onPointerDrag(Event)  
void onPointerEnd(Event)  
void onPointerStart(Event)  
void paint(Clock) This must be called every frame with an alpha-adjusted clock.
 

Added Methods

void onEnd(Interaction)

Added Fields

Slot<Clock> onPaint This must be connected to a paint signal.
 

Changed Fields
Signal<Interaction> clicked Change in type from Signal<Event> to Signal<Interaction>.
 A signal that is emitted (with the pointer end event) on click.
